definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a surname, originating from English and possibly derived from a place name or occupational term.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个专有名词，通常用作姓氏，源自英语，可能来源于地名或职业称谓。
definitions.example_en: John Ingram is the CEO of the technology firm.
definitions.example_cn: 约翰·英格拉姆是这家科技公司的首席执行官。
